nhc_headline: ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, DAMAGING WIND GUSTS, AND  FLOODING RAINFALL PERSISTING OVER EASTERN TEXAS... ...1200 PM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, DAMAGING WIND GUSTS, AND  FLOODING RAINFALL PERSISTING OVER EASTERN TEXAS... ...1200 PM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 12:00 PM CDT Mon Jul 8
 the center of Beryl was located near 30.3, -95.6
 with movement NNE at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 986 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.
